languages.text: {n}Ваша шпилька попадает в цель: на старческом лице мелькает гневная гримаса. Префект немедленно берет свои чувства под контроль, но поздно: вы заметили, как ее уязвило сказанное — и она знает, что это не скрылось от вас.{/n}

{n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваша шпилька попадает в цель: на старческом лице мелькает гневная гримаса. Префект немедленно берет свои чувства под контроль, но поздно: вы заметили, как ее уязвило сказанное — и она знает, что это не скрылось от вас.{/n}

{n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Provokation trifft ins Ziel. Eine wütende Grimasse huscht über das Gesicht der Präfektin. Sie sammelt sich sofort wieder, aber es ist zu spät ... du hast gesehen, wie sehr sie deine Worte beleidigt haben, und sie weiß, dass dir ihre Reaktion nicht entgangen ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Provokation trifft ins Ziel. Eine wütende Grimasse huscht über das Gesicht der Präfektin. Sie sammelt sich sofort wieder, aber es ist zu spät ... du hast gesehen, wie sehr sie deine Worte beleidigt haben, und sie weiß, dass dir ihre Reaktion nicht entgangen ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La préfète grimace de colère, signe que votre provocation a touché fait mouche. Elle se reprend immédiatement, mais il est trop tard : vous avez vu à quel point vous l'avez offensée et elle en est bien consciente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète grimace de colère, signe que votre provocation a touché fait mouche. Elle se reprend immédiatement, mais il est trop tard : vous avez vu à quel point vous l'avez offensée et elle en est bien consciente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的讽刺命中了要害，行政官脸上立刻掠过一丝怒意。她随即冷静了下来，但为时已晚。你意识到，你的话着实刺痛了她，她也意识到，她的反应完全被你看在眼里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的讽刺命中了要害，行政官脸上立刻掠过一丝怒意。她随即冷静了下来，但为时已晚。你意识到，你的话着实刺痛了她，她也意识到，她的反应完全被你看在眼里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu burla da en el blanco: una mueca furiosa cruza fugazmente la cara de la prefecta. Recupera la compostura al instante, pero es tarde. Has visto lo mucho que tus palabras le han afectado, y ella sabe que has notado su reacción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu burla da en el blanco: una mueca furiosa cruza fugazmente la cara de la prefecta. Recupera la compostura al instante, pero es tarde. Has visto lo mucho que tus palabras le han afectado, y ella sabe que has notado su reacción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの嘲りは的中し、総監の顔に怒りの色が走る。彼女はすぐに平静を取り戻したが、すでに遅かった。あなたの言葉がどれほど彼女を怒らせたか、そしてあなたがその反応を見逃さなかったことを彼女は知っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの嘲りは的中し、総監の顔に怒りの色が走る。彼女はすぐに平静を取り戻したが、すでに遅かった。あなたの言葉がどれほど彼女を怒らせたか、そしてあなたがその反応を見逃さなかったことを彼女は知っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lafı gediğine oturtuyorsun. Prefektin yüzü bir anlığına öfkeyle buruşuyor. Çabucak kendini toparlasa da önemi yok. Sözlerinin onun ne kadar ağırına gittiğini gördün. O da bunun farkında.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your taunt hits its mark: an angry grimace passes over the prefect's face. She immediately recomposes herself, but it is too late — you saw how much your words have offended her, and she knows that you caught her reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lafı gediğine oturtuyorsun. Prefektin yüzü bir anlığına öfkeyle buruşuyor. Çabucak kendini toparlıyor ancak artık iş işten geçti. Sözlerinin onun ne kadar ağırına gittiğini gördün. Gördüğünün de farkında.{/n}
